metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21240 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: httplib2 is a comprehensive HTTP client library for Python. In httplib2 before version 0.19.0, a malicious server which responds with long series of "\xa0" characters in the "www-authenticate" header may cause Denial of Service (CPU burn while parsing header) of the httplib2 client accessing said server. This is fixed in version 0.19.0 which contains a new implementation of auth headers parsing using the pyparsing library.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> patch will introduce dependency on the pyparsing package

criterions.comment: python-httplib2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
